017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.util;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotBlankArgument;
023
024import java.time.DateTimeException;
025import java.time.ZoneId;
026import java.time.ZoneOffset;
027import java.time.temporal.TemporalAccessor;
028import java.time.zone.ZoneRulesException;
029import java.util.HashMap;
030import java.util.Map;
031
032import org.apiguardian.api.API;
033import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
034import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.UtilityClass;
035import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError;
036
037/**
038 *  Additional helpers for the work with date/time values.
039 *
040 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
041 *  @version $Id: DateTimeUtils.java 1080 2024-01-03 11:05:21Z tquadrat $
042 *  @since 0.3.0
043 *
044 *  @UMLGraph.link
045 */
046@UtilityClass
047@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: DateTimeUtils.java 1080 2024-01-03 11:05:21Z tquadrat $" )
048@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.3.0" )
049public final class DateTimeUtils
050{
051        /*------------------------*\
052    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
053        \*------------------------*/
054    /**
055     *  The cached zone ids.
056     */
057    @SuppressWarnings( "StaticCollection" )
058    private static final Map<String,ZoneId> m_ZoneIdCache = new HashMap<>();
059
060        /*--------------*\
061    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
062        \*--------------*/
063    /**
064     *  No instance allowed for this class!
065     */
066    private DateTimeUtils() { throw new PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError( DateTimeUtils.class ); }
067
068        /*---------*\
069    ====** Methods **==========================================================
070        \*---------*/
071    /**
072     *  <p>{@summary Replaces the given instance of
073     *  {@link ZoneId}
074     *  by one from the cache.}</p>
075     *
076     *  @param  zoneId  The instance of {@code ZoneId} that needs to be
077     *      replaced.
078     *  @return The instance of {@code ZoneId} from the cache; this may be the
079     *      same as the argument in case the zone id was not yet in the cache.
080     *
081     *  @see #retrieveCachedZoneId(String)
082     */
083    public static final ZoneId replaceByCachedZoneId( final ZoneId zoneId )
084    {
085        final ZoneId retValue;
086        synchronized( m_ZoneIdCache )
087        {
088            retValue = m_ZoneIdCache.computeIfAbsent( requireNonNullArgument( zoneId, "zoneId" ).getId(), $ -> zoneId );
089        }
090
091        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
092        return retValue;
093    }   //  replaceByCachedZoneId()
094
095    /**
096     *  <p>{@summary Retrieves a cached instance of
097     *  {@link ZoneId}.}</p>
098     *
099     *  <p>Usually, each call to
100     *  {@link ZoneId#of(String)}
101     *  returns a new instance, even if the argument remains the same. This
102     *  means that it cannot be assumed that</p>
103     *  <pre><code>ZoneId.of( "UTC" ) == ZoneId.of( "UTC" )</code></pre>
104     *  <p>returns {@code true} (although it cannot be excluded either).</p>
105     *  <p>If an application uses {@code ZoneId}s a lot, this could cause
106     *  significant memory pressure, so it would make sense to cache them.</p>
107     *  <p>This is safe because the instances of {@code ZoneId} are immutable
108     *  (the documentation says, they should be treated as
109     *  <i>ValueBased</i>).</p>
110     *  <p>As the number of distinct timezones is limited, there is no
111     *  housekeeping for the cache itself.</p>
112     *
113     *  @note The id strings are case-sensitive!
114     *
115     *  @param  id  The id for the time zone.
116     *  @return The instance of {@code ZoneId} for the given id.
117     *  @throws DateTimeException   The given id has an invalid format.
118     *  @throws ZoneRulesException  The given id is a region id that cannot be
119     *      found.
120     *
121     *  @see <a href="https://stackoverflow.com/a/77660700/1554195">stackoverflow: &quot;Many instances of java.time.ZoneRegion in Java heap&quot;</a>
122     */
123    public static final ZoneId retrieveCachedZoneId( final String id ) throws DateTimeException, ZoneRulesException
124    {
125        final ZoneId retValue;
126        synchronized( m_ZoneIdCache )
127        {
128            retValue = m_ZoneIdCache.computeIfAbsent( requireNotBlankArgument( id, "id" ), ZoneId::of );
129        }
130
131        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
132        return retValue;
133    }   //  retrievedCachedZoneId()
134
135    /**
136     *  <p>{@summary Retrieves a cached instance of
137     *  {@link ZoneId}
138     *  using a map of aliases.}</p>
139     *
140     *  @param  id  The id for the time zone.
141     *  @param  aliases A map of alias zone ids (typically abbreviations) to
142     *      real zone ids.
143     *  @return The instance of {@code ZoneId} for the given id.
144     *  @throws DateTimeException   The given id has an invalid format.
145     *  @throws ZoneRulesException  The given id is a region id that cannot be
146     *      found.
147     *
148     *  @see #retrieveCachedZoneId(String)
149     *  @see ZoneId#of(String,Map)
150     */
151    public static final ZoneId retrieveCachedZoneId( final String id, final Map<String,String> aliases ) throws DateTimeException, ZoneRulesException
152    {
153        final var zoneId = ZoneId.of( requireNonNullArgument( id, "id" ), requireNonNullArgument( aliases, "aliases" ) );
154        final var retValue = replaceByCachedZoneId( zoneId );
155
156        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
157        return retValue;
158    }   //  retrieveCacheZoneId()
159
160    /**
161     *  <p>{@summary Retrieves a cached instance of
162     *  {@link ZoneId}
163     *  from the given {@code temporal}.}</p>
164     *
165     *  @param  temporal    The temporal object.
166     *  @return The instance of {@code ZoneId} for the temporal.
167     *  @throws DateTimeException   The given temporal cannot be converted to a
168     *      {@code ZoneId}.
169     *
170     *  @see #retrieveCachedZoneId(String)
171     *  @see ZoneId#from(TemporalAccessor)
172     */
173    public static final ZoneId retrieveCachedZoneId( final TemporalAccessor temporal ) throws DateTimeException
174    {
175        final var zoneId = ZoneId.from( requireNonNullArgument( temporal, "temporal" ) );
176        final var retValue = replaceByCachedZoneId( zoneId );
177
178        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
179        return retValue;
180    }   //  retrieveCachedZoneId()
181
182    /**
183     *  <p>{@summary Retrieves a cached instance of
184     *  {@link ZoneId}
185     *  for the given offset.}</p>
186     *
187     *  @param  prefix  One of &quot;GMT&quot;, &quot;UTC&quot;, &quot;UT&quot;
188     *      or the empty string.
189     *  @param  offset  The offset.
190     *  @return The instance of {@code ZoneId} for the arguments.
191     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The prefix is not one of
192     *      &quot;GMT&quot;, &quot;UTC&quot;, &quot;UT&quot; or the empty
193     *      string.
194     *
195     *  @see #retrieveCachedZoneId(String)
196     *  @see ZoneId#ofOffset(String, ZoneOffset)
197     */
198    public static final ZoneId retrieveCachedZoneId( final String prefix, final ZoneOffset offset ) throws IllegalArgumentException
199    {
200        final var zoneId = ZoneId.ofOffset( requireNonNullArgument( prefix, "prefix" ), requireNonNullArgument( offset, "offset" ) );
201        final var retValue = replaceByCachedZoneId( zoneId );
202
203        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
204        return retValue;
205    }   //  retrieveCachedZoneId()
206}
207//  class DateTimeUtils
208
209/*
210 *  End of File
211 */
